answers.answer: Hell lol but you'll make it
LOL like the mama said before me, hell. Sadly you haven't seen anything yet... Just try to stay well hydrated and take time for you!
Lol thanks for the reassuring comments :)

Im almost 30 weeks and everything is just getting harder i know how you feel girl!! Im almost to the finish line but i still have 10 weeks till my due date!! But just making it day by day hoping my aching feet will just keep on going!

It's bad but you'll get through it. This time last year I was 36weeks pregnant with my daughter.. I had a difficult pregnancy.. eg migraines..sciatica and gestational diabetes right to the end. I know how you feel and its natural. But time will fly. You will go through pain I won't lie but you forget the pain when you hold you baby in your arms for the first time. It's all worth it I promise. I have an eleven month old daughter and I'm nine weeks with baby number two. Just remember billions of women give birth.. and go on to do it again. Some do it many times. So yes its bad but not bad enough to stop us having more. You'll be fine.. you'll surprise yourself at how strong you are :) we are designed to give birth. All the best Hon xx

question: So i feel guilty saying this because of you poor ladies almost done. But im 27 weeks an already starting to get uncomfortable. Can barely sleep, peeing, an heartbutn. Not to mention nausea has made a come back an my braxton hicks drive me nuts. Im just thinking, if it's already bad, What's to come!?
title: whats to come?
